edit: There is also a QR code, shown just for a split second! It redirects me to this: [url]https://mm.mtv.com/avTWzR[/url]

item.title: Left 4 Dead 3 at VGA?!
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
OrderOfDagon:

It’s so funny that Valve knows how little replay ability Left 4 Dead has, so they make more so soon. They should just let it die in peace, or go episodic. Seriously I have hated Left 4 dead since it came out. Why not release a new installment of their main franshinse; “Half-life”. Gabe Newell is eating all the people with a brain in that facility.

Haha wow. The reason you think is has not replayability is you’ve been playing the same campaign over and over with the bots. Get some friends together and play some custom campaigns, they’re badass. Or switch over to versus or scavenge which has tons of replayability.

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead 3 at VGA?!
item.dc:creator: DiePoente
item.description:
I see people in my list having more than 300 hours in L4D and L4D2. (One has even 1000 hours).

Yeah, truly “little replay ability”. And Valve has more than 250 devs. They all aren’t just working on L4D

item.title: Left 4 Dead 3 at VGA?!
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
sploopidy:

Well consider my specs.

A single core 1.15 Ghrz processor
1 GB DDR RAM
Nvidia GeForce 6200 GT (AGP 8x)
40 GB HDD
Windows XP

…and I still run Left 4 Dead 2. And yes, at 640x480. Maybe I’ll post a screenshot later :3

I was simply pointing out that VGA is the codename for 640x480, just like XGA is 1024x768 and QVGA is 320x240.

trying to make an ironic joke about an unrelated subject yay :retard:

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead 3 at VGA?!
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Krazor:

I totally forgot deaa riosign 2 was getting a sequel! I really do hope it’s better than the last one. After that train mission, I didn’t even feel like playing it anymore. I heard it’s a completely different team this time, though! Thanks for reminding me!

deaa riosign 3: aeg ofr entroby, Dec 2013! Can’t wait!

Also:
Fordhan Cheezman

Train mission was fine, quit bitchin’.

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead 3 at VGA?!
item.dc:creator: CUatTHEFINISH
item.description:
Just as anybody else has said in this thread, I HIGHLY doubt it would be L4D3. Mainly for the fact there’s a huge riff in the online community between 1 and 2. So much so, that nobody I know even bothers to play the games anymore.

In fact, the only good gaming I got out of 2 over the last half of the year was the No Mercy release. They’d be shooting themselves in the foot IMHO. I’m willing to bet they’ll port L4D1 over entirely to L4D2 before another release.

My best guess is DR3 as well, considering its past successes.

Read full topic
